Buildingtypes.name: O2 Condensor
Buildingtypes.description: O2 Condensors act as super concentrators and take in oxygen developed from nearby greenhouses, Scrubbers, and hydroponic labs and disperses it through out the ship. Also equipped with an electrolysis unit to convert water in to oxygen and hydrogen when oxygen levels reach 18%.

Buildingtypes.name: O2 Scrubber
Buildingtypes.description: This unit scrubs out CO2 and some other gasses, giving the necessary amount to greenhouses and hydroponic labs to make oxygen out of.

Buildingtypes.name: Hydroponics Lab
Buildingtypes.description: The Hydroponics lab accelerates the food production of Greenhouses, as well as produce oxygen.

Buildingtypes.name: Bio Composter
Buildingtypes.description: Composting unit for the Greenhouse and Hydroponics lab to create new soil. It takes in plant debris and supplemented with processed biological waste.

Buildingtypes.name: Greenhouse
Buildingtypes.description: Grows starters from the hydroponics lab in to edible food.

Buildingtypes.name: Sewage Treatment
Buildingtypes.description: Processes all sewage and sends out to be reused again. Requires 100 gallons to be functional.

Buildingtypes.name: Main Thrusters
Buildingtypes.description: Thrusters are used to propel the ship to your destination. They use fuel, and should only be fired to reach your cruising speed when recommended.

Buildingtypes.name: Engine Block
Buildingtypes.description: The Engine block creates massive energy to fuel the Thrusters, as well as the Auxiliary Thrusters.

Buildingtypes.name: Auxiliary Thrusters
Buildingtypes.description: These are on the right, left, and front of your ship to alter course so you can reach your destination or slow down the ship. They consume fuel and should be left in the hands of an experienced navigator.

Buildingtypes.name: Engine Cooling System
Buildingtypes.description: This system maximizes the fuel efficiency as well as keeps the engine and thrusters from exploding when used.

Buildingtypes.name: Power Station
Buildingtypes.description: Converts solar energy and stores excess energy from the engine block to batteries and disperses through the rest of the ship.

Buildingtypes.name: Water Recycling
Buildingtypes.description: Takes the runniest of liquid from the Sewage plant and harvesters, then purifies to reuse.

Buildingtypes.name: Water Harvester
Buildingtypes.description: The Water Harvester gathers condensation inside the ship, and extracts from outside the ship when placed on the edge.

Buildingtypes.name: Cafeteria
Buildingtypes.description: The Cafeteria is a place to feed the civilians what they need to continue working.

Buildingtypes.name: Resturaunt
Buildingtypes.description: The restaurant is a place to provide higher quality food and familiar surroundings to fewer individuals.

Buildingtypes.name: Music Club
Buildingtypes.description: Just a room with a bunch of instruments. A place your civilians can go explore their creative sides.

Buildingtypes.name: Arcade
Buildingtypes.description: A gaming center with power efficient arcade games.

Buildingtypes.name: Game Room
Buildingtypes.description: Board games, tables, pool table, and recreation that does not require electricity.

Buildingtypes.name: Lounge
Buildingtypes.description: Comfortable couches and chairs and even a podium.

Buildingtypes.name: Movie Theater
Buildingtypes.description: A place to show movies you brought on a projector... or maybe even videos you make.

Buildingtypes.name: Bar
Buildingtypes.description: Humans will find a way to make alcohol under any situation. So why not let it be allowed and give a place to enjoy it.

Buildingtypes.name: Dormatory
Buildingtypes.description: Fits ten bunk beds. Whether sleeping is done in shifts is up to you.

Buildingtypes.name: Waste Recycling
Buildingtypes.description: repurposes anything that isn't considered sewage and converts broken things to spare parts.

Buildingtypes.name: Restrooms
Buildingtypes.description: Toilets. Sink upgrade available.

Buildingtypes.name: Showers
Buildingtypes.description: Regulate them how you see fit.

Buildingtypes.name: Classroom
Buildingtypes.description: A room to give children a head start on life among the space colony. Or perhaps use for other purposes.

Buildingtypes.name: Security Office
Buildingtypes.description: Deals with drama and crimes committed. A central office for security and intelligence to work together.

Buildingtypes.name: Private Quarters
Buildingtypes.description: Giant fancy living quarters, appropriate for a captain or his favorites.

Buildingtypes.name: Offices
Buildingtypes.description: General work space, assign how you feel necessary.

Buildingtypes.name: Bridge
Buildingtypes.description: Where navigation is handled, and central post for command.

Buildingtypes.name: Government Center
Buildingtypes.description: Once the colony grows, you'll need a place to meet with the community leaders and conduct government business.

Buildingtypes.name: Storage
Buildingtypes.description: Where the supplies are kept.

Buildingtypes.name: Geologist Lab
Buildingtypes.description: A place for a geologist to focus on how or where he can help

Buildingtypes.name: Biology Lab
Buildingtypes.description: A place for a biologist to focus on how or where he can help

Buildingtypes.name: Medical Lab
Buildingtypes.description: A place to advance medicines and monitor ship health

Buildingtypes.name: Engineer Lab
Buildingtypes.description: A place for an engineer to focus on how he can improve or fix ship issues.

Buildingtypes.name: Mechanic Lab
Buildingtypes.description: A place for a mechanic to improve mechanics on the ship or fix things.

Buildingtypes.name: Computer Lab
Buildingtypes.description: Equipped with a complete wiki of Earth, this is the library for all known knowledge. Also helps civilians improve technical skills.

Buildingtypes.name: Workshop
Buildingtypes.description: Hub for technicians and maintenance workers for issues with ships. Crafts raw resources in to spare parts with spare time.

Buildingtypes.name: Child Care
Buildingtypes.description: A place to keep the little ones so they don't distract mom or dad from their duties.

Buildingtypes.name: Medical Bay
Buildingtypes.description: A doctors office. Crafts biological resources in to medicines in spare time.

Buildingtypes.name: Janitor Room
Buildingtypes.description: Janitors here clean general areas where janitors are not specifically assigned.

Buildingtypes.name: Gymnasium
Buildingtypes.description: An assortment of weight benches and treadmills

Buildingtypes.name: Gravity Control
Buildingtypes.description: Keeps people walking on the ground.

Buildingtypes.name: Power Storage
Buildingtypes.description: A place to store excess energy in times of prosperity and engine thrusting.

Buildingtypes.name: Fuel Storage
Buildingtypes.description: Where fuel is held and processed

Buildingtypes.name: Water Storage
Buildingtypes.description: Where water is stored.
